document_data.name: Scepter District of Athkatla
document_data.caption: A part of the Scepter District of Athkatla.
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Scepter District''' was an exclusive ward of [[Athkatla]], home to the city's most wealthy, aristocratic families. Some of these rich mercantile houses owned magnificent sprawling estates within the district, some of which were the size of several city blocks. The scepter district was located in the southwest portion of Athkatla, along the [[Sea of Swords]], walled off from the [[Center District (Athkatla)|Center District]]. The ''Olemandur Gate'' led southward out of the city.

No Athkatlans of common birth were welcome within the Scepter district unless they were performing errands or tasks for residents who lived within its walls.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Council House]]: The seat of power for the [[Council of Six (Amn)|Council of Six]], the oligarchical rulers of [[Amn]].
* [[Cloakspell Tower]]: This landmark of Athkatla was the most striking landmark within the district.
